title: Health Care
content:
The consequences of government's move from talking about hungry to talking about food insecure people.
"Today’s targets for federal redistribution programs are no longer the “skinny, starving” children who were the beneficiaries of Lyndon Johnson’s “War on Poverty” – they are suburban families basking in credit cards and SUVs; iPhone-clad city folks wheeling around in new cars and designer gym shoes; and middle class college students in 4-year programs at major universities." More fraud.
source: Freedom is always the right answer
